scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy: yarn compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.factory: yarn compile && npx hardhat run scripts/factory.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy-testnet: yarn compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-testnet.js --network testnet
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-testnet.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy-iterable: yarn compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-iterable.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy-testnet-iterable: yarn compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-iterable.js --network testnet
scripts.deploy-mainnet-iterable: yarn compile && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-iterable.js --network mainnet
